name: Apocryphauna
storyline:
There's something wrong with you. You've been sent away to a private boarding school so they can fix you. If that weren't bad enough, they took away your entire collection of Apocryphauna trading cards. If you want to rebuild your collection, you'll have to be careful. If they catch you again, the punishment will be so much worse.

After all, the nuns think this game is evil — that playing with these cards can summon Discordia, the mother of all demons. But that's not true. It's just a game... right?
summary: Content Warning: contains depictions of transphobia, homophobia, religious extremism, and child abuse, along with brief violent and tryphopobic imagery.
